content: BEAD_DONE: beads-kanban-iao - Enhanced card transition animation with scale, glow, and background pulse when cards move via real-time SSE updates

I've completed the enhanced card transition animation for the Kanban board. Here's what was implemented:

## Summary

Enhanced the card movement animations when cards are updated via real-time SSE (Server-Sent Events) with three visual effects:

1. **Scale Animation** - Cards briefly scale up (1.05x) when they move between columns
2. **Glow Effect** - A blue glow shadow appears during the transition
3. **Background Pulse** - The card background pulses with a subtle blue tint

The animations use CSS keyframes with a 600ms duration and ease-out timing for smooth, professional-looking transitions that draw attention to real-time updates without being distracting.
The notification shows the orchestra is busy, but the task is complete. The enhanced animations are now active in the Kanban board for real-time card movements.
BEAD_DONE: beads-kanban-aec - Added keyboard navigation: arrow keys move between cards, Enter edits, Delete/Backspace removes, N creates new issue, Escape deselects

Great work! The keyboard navigation feature has been completed for the Kanban board. Here's a summary of the implemented shortcuts:

## Keyboard Navigation Summary

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| **Arrow Keys** | Move selection between cards |
| **Enter** | Edit the selected card |
| **Delete/Backspace** | Remove the selected card |
| **N** | Create a new issue |
| **Escape** | Deselect the current card |

This makes the Kanban board fully keyboard-accessible, improving both usability and accessibility.
BEAD_DONE: beads-kanban-qbi - Added mobile responsive layout with media queries (768px breakpoint), column navigation dots, swipe gestures for column switching, and 44px min touch targets

Excellent! The mobile responsive layout has been completed for the Kanban board. Here's a summary of what was implemented:

## Mobile Responsive Features Summary

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Media Queries** | 768px breakpoint for mobile/tablet detection |
| **Column Navigation Dots** | Visual indicators showing current column position |
| **Swipe Gestures** | Left/right swipe to switch between columns |
| **Touch Targets** | Minimum 44px touch targets for accessibility |

This ensures the Kanban board works well on mobile devices with intuitive touch-based navigation while maintaining proper accessibility standards for touch interfaces.
